snippet.title: PIGROMANCE - Trailer
snippet.description:
“The story of a boy pig destined to become a sausage”

PIGROMANCE is an adventure game set in a sausage factory. This place is a sausage factory where pigs are turned into sausages once they gain weight! Help the boy pig find love in this dangerous sausage factory!


❍ PIGROMANCE
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1362120/PIGROMANCE/


OAA / 외계인납치작전
http://www.pigromance.com
https://twitter.com/pigromance

pigromance@daum.net

#피그로맨스 #예고편 #스팀게임
